channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Exclusive: Florida U.S. Senate challenger launches WhatsApp channel to reach voters
item.description: Florida Democratic Senate candidate Debbie Mucarsel-Powell is launching an effort to directly reach Spanish-speaking voters through the popular encrypted messaging platform WhatsApp.
item.content:encoded:
Florida Democratic Senate candidate Debbie Mucarsel-Powell is launching an effort to directly reach Spanish-speaking voters through the popular encrypted messaging platform WhatsApp.

(Image credit: Joe Raedle/Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Claudia Grisales

item.title: The journey 2 siblings made each day during the school year to attend classes
item.description: For years Luis Montero Adams and his sister Stephanie Machado, who are U.S. citizens but lived in Mexico, traveled across the border to attend U.S. schools. Then Sept. 11 forced them to make a choice.
item.content:encoded: For years Luis Montero Adams and his sister Stephanie Machado, who are U.S. citizens but lived in Mexico, traveled across the border to attend U.S. schools. Then Sept. 11 forced them to make a choice.
item.dc:creator: Jey Born

item.title: Trump staffers in cemetery scuffle named. And, dad of alleged school shooter arrested
item.description: NPR confirmed the names of the two Trump staffers involved in the Arlington cemetery scuffle. And, the father of the Georgia school shooting suspect arrested.
item.content:encoded:
NPR confirmed the names of the two Trump staffers involved in the Arlington cemetery scuffle. And, the father of the Georgia school shooting suspect arrested.

(Image credit: Anna Moneymaker)
item.dc:creator: Brittney Melton

item.title: Democrats hope Sen. Sherrod Brown can win in Ohio by losing less in rural counties
item.description: Ohio Democrat Sherrod Brown hopes to keep his Senate seat in increasingly red Ohio by campaigning directly to rural voters. Democrats hope the key to victory is simply losing by less in areas where the GOP dominates.
item.content:encoded:
Ohio Democrat Sherrod Brown hopes to keep his Senate seat in increasingly red Ohio by campaigning directly to rural voters. Democrats hope the key to victory is simply losing by less in areas where the GOP dominates.

(Image credit: Rebecca Kiger for NPR)
item.dc:creator: Ximena Bustillo

item.title: A new kind of chaplain is helping people deal with 'climate grief'
item.description: A new kind of spiritual advisor is rising among clergy trained in handling grief and other difficult emotions.
item.content:encoded:
A new kind of spiritual advisor is rising among clergy trained in handling grief and other difficult emotions.

(Image credit: Kimberly Winston)
item.dc:creator: Kimberly Winston

item.title: Humpback whales make custom fishing nets — out of bubbles
item.description: To target the tiny prey they depend on, humpbacks have developed a way of trapping them with nets made out of bubbles. A new study shows exactly how they do it.
item.content:encoded:
To target the tiny prey they depend on, humpbacks have developed a way of trapping them with nets made out of bubbles. A new study shows exactly how they do it.

(Image credit: Hunter Warick)
item.dc:creator: Lauren Sommer

item.title: A fire at a school dormitory in Kenya kills at least 17 students
item.description: There are fears that the death toll may rise, police said, as President William Ruto called the news “devastating.”
item.content:encoded:
There are fears that the death toll may rise, police said, as President William Ruto called the news “devastating.”

(Image credit: AP)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: LL Cool J goes back to his roots in his new album
item.description: LL Cool J is out with his first album in over a decade. He says on Morning Edition, "I've been here for years, baby. How are you going to call it a comeback?"
item.content:encoded:
LL Cool J is out with his first album in over a decade. He says on Morning Edition, "I've been here for years, baby. How are you going to call it a comeback?"

(Image credit: Shuran Huang)
item.dc:creator: Reena Advani

item.title: Which high-profile Republican says they are voting for Harris? Find out in the quiz
item.description: Queens of the chart, field and Maori adorn the quiz this week, and we also address seasonal topics like memoirs and TV shows. Enjoy it while you can!
item.content:encoded: Queens of the chart, field and Maori adorn the quiz this week, and we also address seasonal topics like memoirs and TV shows. Enjoy it while you can!
item.dc:creator: Holly J. Morris

item.title: Yeast infections are miserable. And some over-the-counter treatments can backfire
item.description: For some people, 1-day topical treatments for yeast infections can cause their own irritation. And some doctors steer their patients away from the 1-day options — which contain 12 times the medicine of the 7-day treatment.
item.content:encoded:
For some people, 1-day topical treatments for yeast infections can cause their own irritation. And some doctors steer their patients away from the 1-day options — which contain 12 times the medicine of the 7-day treatment.

(Image credit: Selena Simmons-Duffin)
item.dc:creator: Selena Simmons-Duffin
